sentences.en: Alteration is very extensive in some areas and serpentinites are common in Greece.
sentences.cn: 在一些地区蚀变作用非常广泛,在希腊蛇纹岩是常见的.

sentences.en: An indefinite alteration had come over his whole person and manner.
sentences.cn: 他整个的人和态度已经有了一种说不出的变化.

sentences.en: Even more disastrous was the alteration in the relative strength of the French and German Armies.
sentences.cn: 更不幸的是,法德陆军实力对比发生了变化.

sentences.en: He easily perceived there was an alteration in my countenance.
sentences.cn: 他立刻看出我的脸色和往常有些不同.

sentences.en: Her jacket was at the boutique waiting for alteration.
sentences.cn: 她的短上衣放在时装店里，要做些改动。

sentences.en: How much alteration will be necessary?
I had no more thoughts of coming to a timely alteration of life.
sentences.cn: 我简直不想及时改变生活了.

sentences.en: If you make alterations to the Windows setup, save the new settings before closing.
sentences.cn: 如果更改了视窗操作系统的设置，关闭前要保存新的设置。

sentences.en: Light reveals the subtle alteration of things, the sly or calamitous impermanence or mortal life.
sentences.cn: 事物的细微变动, 人生的狡猾,倏忽无常,一一都在光中显露出来.

sentences.en: Making some simple alterations to your diet will make you feel fitter.
sentences.cn: 对你的饮食做一些简单的改变会使你感觉更健康。

sentences.en: Prices may be subject to alteration.
The alteration would entail an expenditure of 50 pounds.
sentences.cn: 此项改变将带来为数五十英磅的花费.

sentences.en: The timetable is subject to alteration.
This agreement is not susceptible to alteration.
We can see if the dress needs alteration after we've fitted it on.
sentences.cn: 试穿之后才能看出衣服是否需要改做.

sentences.en: Wow, it's very becoming on you, only waist need a bit alteration.
sentences.cn: 哇, 这件很适合你, 只有腰部需要一点改动.

words.tran_cn: （趋于）改变的；变质的；使体质逐渐康复的；有改变体质作用的
为参加短程高速汽车赛而改装的赛车

trans.tran_en: a small change that makes someone or something slightly different, or the process of this change
